<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/{slug}/projects/{project_id}/modules/{module_id}/module-issues/{issue_id}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remove a work item from a module while keeping the work item in the project.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
